title: XiaoSign插件报错
author: 云树
txt_content:
不论累计签到7天 15天 25天 都不给玩家东西 求解决 权限已经给玩家
插件报错
[08:10:24] [Server thread/ERROR]: Could not pass event InventoryOpenEvent to XiaoSign v1.0.3
        at zbv5.cn.XiaoSign.Listener.PlayerListener.onInventoryOpen(PlayerListener.java:27) ~[?:?]

        at zbv5.cn.XiaoSign.Listener.PlayerListener.onInventoryOpen(PlayerListener.java:27) ~[?:?]

[08:14:17] [Server thread/ERROR]: Could not pass event InventoryClickEvent to XiaoSign v1.0.3
        at zbv5.cn.XiaoSign.Listener.PlayerListener.onInventoryClick(PlayerListener.java:62) ~[?:?]

        at zbv5.cn.XiaoSign.Listener.PlayerListener.onInventoryOpen(PlayerListener.java:27) ~[?:?]


插件配置
#储存方式: Yml Mysql
Store: Yml
#数据库配置
Mysql:
  Url: "jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1:3306/db?useSSL=false"
  User: "root"
  PassWord: "root"
SignReward:
  EveryDay:
    default:
      NeedSlot: 1
      NeedPermission: 'XiaoSign.sign.default'
      priority: 99999
      Reward:
        - '[console] eco give <player> 20'
        - '[message]&a&6[&b每日签到&6]&a签到成功,奖励已发送至你的背包.'
    vip:
      NeedSlot: 1
      NeedPermission: 'XiaoSign.sign.vip'
      priority: 9999
      Reward:
        - '[console] eco give <player> 20'
        - '[message]&a&6[&b每日签到&6]&c尊贵的会员玩家,您已签到成功!奖励已发送至你的背包.'
  RewardWeekEx:
    Enable: true
    List:
      7:
        NeedSlot: 1
        Reward:
          - '[console]give <player> 5050 1'
          - '[message]&a&6[&b每日签到&6]&a签到成功,奖励已发送至你的背包.'
  RewardMonthEx:
    Enable: true
    List:
      15:
        NeedSlot: 1
        Reward:
          - '[console]rpgitem 太阳能 give <player>'
          - '[message]&a&6[&b每日签到&6]&a签到成功,奖励已发送至你的背包.'
      25:
        NeedSlot: 1
        Reward:
          - '[console]rpgitem 加速火把 give <player>'
          - '[message]&a&6[&b每日签到&6]&a签到成功,奖励已发送至你的背包.'
  RewardAllEx:
    Enable: false
    List:
      365:
        NeedSlot: 1
        Reward:
          - '[console]give <player> 1 1'
          - '[message]&a&6[&b每日签到&6]&a签到成功,奖励已发送至你的背包.'

replies.author: ho2110877
replies.txt_content: 我有一個疑問,這個插件在你的服務器上有正常運行過嗎?

replies.author: apzt
replies.txt_content: 配置文件修改看看有没有错误
